title: The Cold War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/12/21
itunes:title: The Cold War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/12/21
description:
George Noory and author Giles Milton discuss how the Cold War began as the United States and Soviet Union battled for control of Berlin following the end of World War II, and the military struggles that continued for more than 40 years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An examination into the beginning of the rivalry between the United States and the Soviet Union.
